WorkItem.Description:
Basically, the Valorous plagueheart leggings are showing up as having 0 (zero) dps associated with it and when equipped, reduces the whole dps to zero. 
I updated the item cache both from the armory and wowhead, but it makes no difference.
Â 
Is there a workaround?
WorkItem.Summary: [Warlock] DPS resets to Zero upon adding Valorous Plagueheart Leggings

Comments.Message:
I'm having a similar problem.  I used the optimiser, which recommended the leggings, but now, when I've just updated from armoury my DPS claims to be 0.00...  any chance of a fix please?
Thanks
Can you attach your saved character file so I can take a look at it?  I'm having trouble reproducing the issue and having your character data might help me in that. Thanks!

Here's my file.  I'm not 100% convinced it was the leggings - I originally found it went to 0 when I put a talent point into Pyroclasm.  Then I respecced and used the kit Rawr recommended (including the leggings) and not it says 0 nomatter what...  :(
Check your spell priority and see if it has more than just SB in it. Mine sets to zero once I add any other spell to the list.

I spotted that last night, I changed it so I just had incinerate as priority.  I always assumed that it was for your priority spells (plural) rather than individual spell.  But yey, it seems to be working...  However, for some reason it's crasing when I load up my old character file (attached earlier) and will have to go through and re-add all the kit I'm carrying around like a numpty!  :D

Thanks  :)

Moving conflag above incinerate fixes the zero DPS problem shown in your save file. This is a priority casting system so you want your filler (incinerate in this case) to be the last spell (lowest priority).  Try something like CoD > Conflag > Immolate >Chaos Bolt > Incinerate
